content: the next row child sizes proceed to separate sleeves and body the markers placed in the previous row locate the edges of the garter panels they will remain adult sizes in place until the hem is worked row 5 rs knit to marker sm knit to 1 st before raglan marker m1 k1 sm k1 m1 4 times set-up row ws knit to marker sm knit to end 8 sts increase - 2 at knit to marker sm garter edge each raglan marker p3 pm front row 6 ws knit to marker sm purl to 1 st p14 16 16 18 18 18 18 18 18 20 22 22 22 before raglan marker m1p p1 sm p1 m1p 4 20 22 22 22 22 20 pm sleeve times purl to marker sm knit to end 8 sts increase - 2 at each raglan marker p24 30 32 36 36 40 40 40 40 46 50 48 48 52 56 62 70 74 78 pm back row 7 rs knit to marker sm k2 m1 knit to 1 st before raglan marker m1 k1 sm k1 m1 p14 16 16 18 18 18 18 18 18 20 22 22 22 4 times knit to 2 sts before marker m1 k2 sm 20 22 22 22 22 20 pm sleeve knit to end 10 sts increase - 2 at each raglan marker p3 front this brings you to the last marker sm and 1 at each neckline knit to end garter edge row 8 ws knit to marker sm purl to 1 st 74 84 90 98 102 106 106 106 106 120 128 before raglan marker m1p p1 sm p1 m1p 4 126 126 130 138 144 152 156 156 total sts times purl to marker sm knit to end 8 sts increase - 2 at each raglan marker there are now 6 markers in the work the first and last markers locate the garter edges and work row 5-8 a total of 1 1 1 1 1 1 2 2 2 2 3 4 raglan markers indicate where the raglan 5 times increases will occur harvest cardigan facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 5 212 230 244 252 268 286 306 332 356 382 body 402 434 total sts first you ll continue neckline shaping until the 12 12 14 14 14 14 16 16 16 16 16 16 sts at full stitch count is reached then you ll work even each garter edge to the garter hem 20 23 23 23 26 29 31 34 37 40 42 46 sts at child sizes and adult xs to xxl each front row 1 rs knit to marker sm k2 m1 knit to 2 sts 42 46 48 50 54 58 60 66 70 74 78 84 sts at before marker m1 k2 sm knit to end 2 sts increase each sleeve row 2 ws knit to marker sm purl to marker and 64 68 74 78 80 84
